plot: The Judas Tree is a supernatural entity, created from the soul of the betrayer, Judas Iscariot. The tree reflects the inner nature of a man's soul, which reveals the wickedness within. Once the evil is exposed, the affliction begins.
title: The Judas Tree
plot_es: The Judas Tree is a supernatural entity, created from the soul of the betrayer, Judas Iscariot. The tree reflects the inner nature of a man's soul, which reveals the wickedness within. Once the evil is exposed, the affliction begins.
plot_en: The Judas Tree is a supernatural entity, created from the soul of the betrayer, Judas Iscariot. The tree reflects the inner nature of a man's soul, which reveals the wickedness within. Once the evil is exposed, the affliction begins.
